title: Tim Cook - Wikipedia
snippet: As CEO of Apple, Cook met U.S. House members on 10 December 2025 to push back against a federal legislation that could require Apple to authenticate users' ages and possibly collect sensitive data on children.

title: Apple announces executive transitions - Apple
snippet: December 4, 2025 · PRESS RELEASE · Apple announces executive transitions · Jennifer Newstead to join Apple as senior vice president, will become general counsel in March 2026 Kate Adams to retire late next year Lisa Jackson to retire ·
